needle: The secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza mentioned in the document are figs, prosciutto, and goat cheese

model_response.text: To me, the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza are figs, prosciutto, and goat cheese.  I started to write essays about this while working on Viaweb, which was a web-based store builder, and later on Y Combinator, where I wrote essays about various topics.
